on the get page, check the check box for alternate disc, tux9778
can anyone help me with broadcom?
Are you using 8.10 or 8.04 and if 8.10 did restricted manager offer to download firmware or was it simply enabling a driver?
im using 8.04, got it to say it was enabled (FINALLY) but it says not in use, i want it to be in us
sudo apt-get install b43-fwcutter, if it is already installed make sure that it has downloaded and extracted the firmware by doing "sudo dpkg-reconfigure b43-fwcutter"
You need to be connected to the internet for it to download the firmware ( it's not in the .deb file for legal reasons )
